Package game.actions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AddWeaponEffectAction
    Req 5 Action to add WeaponEffect to target that gets attacked with a Weapon that have WeaponEffect (ConcussionStaff and PoisonedAxe).
    AttackAction
    An Action to attack another Actor.
    AttackAllAction
    An action to attack all surrounding actors
    ConsumeAction
    An action that allows Actor to consume consumable items
    DeathAction
    An action executed if an actor is killed.
    DespawnAction
    Despawns an actor from the map by removing it
    PickUpRuneAction
    An action to directly add Runes to the Actor (used by enemies)
    QuickStepAction
    Deals normal damage to the weapon to the target and moves the target away from the attacker.
    ResetAction
    Resets the entire game by executing reset methods of actors and game elements that need to be reset when the game is reset
    RestAction
    Allows the actor to rest at the SiteOfLostGRace
    ReviveAction
    An action that revives the enemy that spawned the actor performing this action
    SpawnAction
    An action that allows an Enemy to spawn another Enemy and it gets removed from the map
    SummonAction
    An action that allows an actor to summon Ally or Invader when in close proximity to the summon sign.
    UnseatheAction
    Performs the Unseathe action on target (an attack where the weapon hit rate is 60 and the weapon's damage is doubled).
    WeaponEffectAction
    Req 5 Action for special skill of Weapon with WeaponEffect (ConcussionStaff and PoisonedAxe)
